name: It's Chefs Play!
description:
It's Chef's Play is an educational game designed with the idea of teaching the fundamentals of cooking.

The game features four basic actions at the bottom of the screen, DESTRUCTURE, HEAT, HUMID HEAT and FRY, and two columns of ingredients (LEFT and CENTRE).

To combine ingredients and actions you will need TIME.

Combining the right actions and ingredients will unlock the dishes in the column on the RIGHT.

HOW TO PLAY

Clicking on ingredients or buttons will select or deselect them. Things colored in RED means that they are selected.  When you want to combine your ingredients and actions click on the TIME button. The TIME button can also be used to RESET everything. Things colored in BLUE means that those are final dishes and are cannot be combined.

HOW TO WIN

Complete the list of dishes in the column on the RIGHT.

Are you ready to learn the basic of cooking and become a starred chef?
